title: WATCH: Wayne Rooney's dig at Jamie Carragher's shirt
description: Wayne Rooney continued his goalscoring form as Everton saw off Swansea 3-1 at Goodison Park on Monday Night Football - and he couldn't help taking a swipe at Jamie Carragher's sartorial taste during a post-match interview.
content: The Blues captain admitted he was not at his best against Paul Clement's side but having missed a first-half penalty, the forward dusted himself down to score his 10th Premier League goal of the season from the spot in the second-half.Everton have now picked up 13 points from their last five games, and Rooney was in good spirits as he spoke to Dave Jones, John Terry and former England team-mate Carragher afterwards, admitting he tuned in to the pre-show preparations on Sky Sports News.He said: "I've seen when you were in your casual gear. I have to say JT was looking OK but Carra your top was horrendous!"Carragher was quick to get in a sharp reply: "A bit like you hairline!"Hit play on the link above to watch the light-hearted exchange.
